Title: Retards
Plot: Following a meeting with Janet, Tommy has yet another confrontation with Johnny; Teddy's conjugal visits with Ellie prove to be a letdown; and Franco tries to befriend his new girlfriend's mentally challenged brother. Elsewhere, Tommy keeps his vigil at Stack's bedside.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Cornell Womack,  Matt Mulhern,  Alison Bartlett,  Sherri Saum,  Tatum O'Neal,  Laith Nakli,  Joe Wissler,  Chris Hartl,  Rizwan Manji,  Adam Ferrara,  Holter Graham,  Jack Hammel,  Florence Annequin
